promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, short, single-word name for a massive strong scorpion psychic-type pokemon with a white crystal core. It can be found in crypt-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, psychic or scorpion. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Cryptixion, a a massive strong scorpion psychic-type pokemon. It can be found in crypt-like environments It has the following abilities: Tri Power, Spooky Balloon. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "scorpion", "psychic" or "Cryptixion". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of psychic-type pokemon, scorpion-like, strong, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, dreamy background
generatedDescription: This colossus, haunting ancient catacombs, masters the Tri Power and Spooky Balloon skills. In silence, it telepathically puzzles intruders.
